title: To establish the Hudson-Fulton-Champlain 400th Commemoration Commission, and for other purposes.
content: Hudson-Fulton-Champlain 400th Commemoration Commission Act of 2002 - Establishes the Hudson-Fulton-Champlain 400th Commemoration Commission to plan, develop, and execute programs and activities appropriate to commemorate the 400th anniversary of the voyage of Henry Hudson , the 200th anniversary of the voyage of Robert Fulton , and the 400th anniversary of the voyage of Samuel de Champlain .
